alert.note: Alert for Lower Jefferson; Lower Lafourche; Lower Terrebonne; St. Charles; Upper Lafourche (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 8:04PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern St. Charles, southeastern Terrebonne and eastern Lafourche Parishes through 845 PM CDT... At 804 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Larose, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Larose, Cut Off, Galliano, Lockport, Golden Meadow, Mathews, Montegut, Leeville, Chauvin and Des Allemands. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Lower Jefferson; Lower Lafourche; Lower Terrebonne; St. Charles; Upper Lafourche
